What day is plump announced 100% of the: US President Donald Trump announced the 100% tariff on imported computer chips and semiconductors on August 6, 2025.
Which products apply to which products a: The 100% tariff applies to imported computer chips and semiconductors manufactured abroad.
In which cases a company can except for: Companies committed to manufacturing in the US are exempt from the 100% tariff.
What was apples investment commitment: Apple announced a future investment of 600 billion dollars.
What was its objective: Its objective is to promote American domestic manufacturing and reduce foreign dependence.
What impact will this new policy have on: This policy will lead to price increases and anti-commercial reactions.
